io.micronaut.serde.annotation

Annotation Type Serdeable.Deserializable


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Introspected
public static @interface Serdeable.Deserializable
    Annotation used to indicate a type is deserializable.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> as
      Use the given class to deserialize this type.
      java.lang.Class<? extends PropertyNamingStrategy> naming 
      java.lang.Class<? extends Deserializer> using 
      boolean validate 

    • Element Detail

      • using

        @AliasFor(annotation=SerdeConfig.class,
          member="deserializerClass")
public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Deserializer> using
        Returns:
        The deserializer.
        Default:
        io.micronaut.serde.Deserializer.class

      • validate

        @AliasFor(annotation=SerdeConfig.class,
          member="validate")
public abstract boolean validate
        Returns:
        Whether build time validation should fail compilation on definition errors.
        Default:
        true

      • as

        @AliasFor(annotation=SerdeConfig.class,
          member="deserAs")
public abstract java.lang.Class<?> as
        Use the given class to deserialize this type.
        Returns:
        A type that is a subclass of the annotated type.
        Default:
        void.class

      • naming

        @AliasFor(annotation=SerdeConfig.class,
          member="naming")
public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends PropertyNamingStrategy> naming
        Returns:
        Naming strategy to use.
        Default:
        io.micronaut.serde.config.naming.IdentityStrategy.class
